item.title: How do i add this into my delta server and where?
item.dc:creator: @Bandos_Pk Ivycial
item.description:
@Bandos_Pk wrote:

{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Server Owner and Coder " +playerName+ " has logged in”;
}
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“The Reaper”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“The Reaper”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“The Reaper”))
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Server Owner " +playerName+ " has logged in”;
}
else if (playerRights == 3)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Server Hoster and Coder, " +playerName+ " has logged in”;
}
else if (playerRights == 2)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Server Administrator " +playerName+ " has logged in”;
}
else if (playerRights == 1)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Moderator " +playerName+ " has logged in”;
}
else if (playerRights == 4)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " has logged in";
}
else if (playerRights == 10)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll =“Co-Owner " +playerName+ " has logged in”;
}
}
